title: MT Interview: Stuart Mustoe, CEO TrustFord - Motor Trader
summary: TrustFord announced changes in leadership with the appointment of a new CEO, Stuart Mustoe. The company aims for a sustainable future with a focus on becoming carbon neutral by 2035 and implementing various green initiatives. TrustFord is recognized for its workplace culture and plans to expand its dealership footprint in Northern England and Scotland.
